descriptionHtml:
Description

This mod add 2 new races to Skyrim.
 
Aquamer
Once upon a time one group of maormers got into Skyrim. They found Glenmoril\'s Witches because they wanted to become stronger as a race and they did ... but in another form. Withes made them Water Elves. 
After that Maormer couldn\'t live without water , they \'ve lost many of their unique abilities but they were saved. Withes foresee that all Maormers in the Tamriel will die from the disease and saved them. Nowadays you can see the Aquamers (as thay named themselves) , only males because females with childs hides in the underwater realms. 

Chimer
Also known as Gilded Elves , they are the ancestors of modern Dark Elves. They were cursed by Azura because they have betrayed her when began to adore another gods. But the most loyal elves were saved by her. Nobody don\'t know why she saved them.

This mod use CBBE body textures 
And Face Textures by me

RECOMMENDED MANUAL INSTALLATION

Install 
Put file to Data Folder

Uninstall
Delete Lost Races.esp
meshes/lostraces
textures/lostraces
author: Den987
